posts.post_content:
Posted By: Patrick McHugh
Someone once asked where are all the T207 Napoleons? Well here they are! This is over 40 percent of the SGC graded napoleons. If a favorite team or player or type card something for everyone. Prices are firm on all cards. Many of these are Sgc 1 of 1 cards! PRICE INCLUDES FAST INSURED SHIPPING. Scans are avalible on all cards. Scans will be sent in order of emails first to say take it gets it. Please email to me at Nth15@comcast.net.Payment in check money order or cash!
